'''Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol''' is a unique one-time enemy encountered in [[Atocpan]], [[Natlan]]. 

Defeating it will reward a [[Luxurious Chest]] and the {{Achievement|Shadows of the Colossi}}.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Repel Mechanism
|desc_1      = Fires up to 2 projectiles at once with moderate homing properties at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and causing significant knockback on hit.<br><br>The launchers can be destroyed by using [[Iansan]] or [[Varesa]]'s special sprint in their [[Nightsoul's Blessing]] state, or by a [[Saurian|Tatankasaur]] in level 2 charge. Destroying a launcher will cause the Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol to lose '''25%''' of its Max HP.<br><br>Alternatively, the player can enter the spotlights around the arena, which will cause the launchers on the walls to fire. If these hit the Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol, its own launchers will not be destroyed, but it will lose '''12.5%''' of its Max HP.
|file_1_2    = Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol Repel Mechanism 2
|caption_1_2 = Destroying Launchers
}}
